item.title: VA Tech Wabag Eyes Breakout Above ₹1,526: SEBI Analyst Deepak Pal
item.description: A positive earnings surprise could set the stage for a rally toward ₹2,000, according to the analyst.

item.title: Equity Mutual Funds Register Record Inflows In July Driven By NFO Frenzy
item.description: Major launches included HDFC Innovation Fund and ICICI Prudential Active Momentum Fund

item.title: Indian Markets At Close: Nifty Reclaims 24,500 Led By Rally In PSU Banks
item.description: AMFI data shows July 2025 marked the strongest month ever for equity MF inflows, driven by blockbuster new fund launches.

item.title: ONGC Q1 Earnings Preview: SEBI RA Rohit Mehta Flags ₹220 As Key Support For Possible Bounce
item.description: Retail sentiment on Stocktwits turned ‘neutral’ ahead of the results. It was ‘bearish’ a day earlier.

item.title: From McDonald’s To Apple, US Brands Face Boycott Calls In India Over Escalating Trump Tariff Tensions
item.description: Indian industry figures and politically connected groups are urging citizens to turn to locally produced goods and services.
